Using

String

Mutiple String

"python" * 5 -> python python python python python

List

Add more

testList = [11, 21, 31, 41] testList + [51, 61] -> [11, 21, 31, 41, 51, 61]

testList[:2] -> [11, 21]

testList[:2] = [0, 0] -> [0, 0, 31, 41, 51, 61]

testList[:2] = [] -> [31, 41, 51, 61]

</code>

IF

if name is "henry":
print("This is henry")

Function

key word argument

def hello(name="henry", age="10"):
print("I am", name, "I am", age, "years old!")

Flexible argument

def hello(* args):
for arg in args:
pring(arg)

Directory

directory = {"name" : "henry", "age" : "10"}
for key, value in directory: print("I am " + directory["name"] + ", I am " + directory["age"] + "years old")

Ehcache Confirguration

Configuration

Expiration settings

  • timeToLivesSeconds - The maximum number of seconds an element can exist in the cache regardless of access
  • timeToIdleSeconds - The maximum number of seconds an element can exist in the cache without being accessed
  • eternal - when set to "true", the expiration configuration of timetoLive and timeToIdle can take no place

Local sizing attributes

  • maxEntriesLocalHeap
  • maxBytesLocalHeap
  • maxEntriesLocalDisk
  • maxBytesLocalDisk

Learning Spring

Create a scheduled task @Scheduled(fixedRate = 5000) the scheduled annotation defines when a particular method runs. NOTE: THis example uses fixedRate, which specifies the interval between method invocations measured from the start time of each invocation. There are other options, like fixedDelay, which specifies the interval betwween invocations measured from the comletion of the task. You can also use @Scheduled(cron=”. . .”) expressions from more sophisticated task scheduling

Design Database

1、 Overview 对于数据库而言， 在日常开发中需要注意两块， 数据结构的设计和索引的优化， 这两块是影响我们最终数据库的数据结构和性能关键地方，自然也是耗费我们精力最多的地方。 本文主要包括数据库设计中的一般性原则和优化手段。
